plot: Billy Shears yearns for a more cinematic life. As he struggles to make his fantasies a reality, he interacts with three friends to help him through his crisis of character. Based on The Beatles song With A Little Help From My Friends
title: The One and Only Billy Shears
plot_es: Billy Shears yearns for a more cinematic life. As he struggles to make his fantasies a reality, he interacts with three friends to help him through his crisis of character. Based on The Beatles song With A Little Help From My Friends
original_name: The One and Only Billy Shears
